Text: Sorry but there are no Holy Spirits you are deluding yourself, you need to start applying logic and common sense to your life instead of praying to imaginary beings. Jesus is dead and always will be, that is the true nature of the world.

Maddave. It is better all your life to believe in Jesus even He might be dead, than not to believe and at the end to find out He is alive. But then it will be too late and your destination of travel with one way ticket will be gate of Hell and eternal condemnation in lake of fire.Choice is yours
Gusar19, there are literally thousands of deities to choose from. What if you die and it is not Jesus, but, say, Odin? Choice is yours.
